attributes.action: Invoke Plan B now to save lives and protect the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
To save lives and protect the NHS. Those working in the NHS are best to say what they need. They are overworked, memtally drained from watching people die day after day. Stretched to the limit throughout all services. 
People need the NHS. Stop putting it under unnecessary pressure by refusing to listen. Do what needs to be done. 
Invoke plan B now. Save our NHS.
attributes.background: The NHS is crying out for help to get through the winter. Listen to those on the front line. Invoke plan B now.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Enact ‘Plan B’ to help keep people and our NHS well this winter.:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599507
